alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 12:30PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade and southern Broward Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1229 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, or 9 miles west of Pembroke Pines, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Hollywood, Miramar, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Weston, Cooper City, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Nova Southeastern University, Royal Palm Ranches, Sunshine Acres, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road, Pine Island Ridge, Intersection Krome And U.S. 27, East Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Country Club and Markham Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Miami-Dade County
